ygData.subject: Re: me and me and totaly ooc (rant,ooc and pathetic lives)
ygData.msgSnippet: ROFL!!! This is me in a nutshell ... except you forgot a couple of parts... - Compiles a full blown notebook of EQ info printed from the web with a huge stck
ygData.messageBody:
ROFL!!! This is me in a nutshell ... except you forgot a couple of parts...

- Compiles a full blown notebook of EQ info printed from the web with a huge
stck of paper on the company high speed laser printer. Take home and think about
doing another one to reference at work ...
- Talk 3 people at work into playing EQ. They become just as addicted as me. We
all milk each other though the bleary eyed first hour of work, dinking caffeine
to help restore a seriousack of sleep.
- Talk several customers (mostly techies) into playing EQ while I'm installing
their new equipment at their site.
- Seriously consider a second account for "those times when I just don't want to
be myself ... but have help from myself"
- Actually start dreaming of those female PC's from EQ. (Hey ... is it just me
or do some of them look damn good?)
- Put off every errand I've had to do for the last month until after Christmas
sometime .... if I'm not busy.
- Started going home for lunch so I can make a quick plat or two.

If you are pathetic then I am too....

-Faderic

schlaban yocksovik wrote:

> From: "schlaban yocksovik" <anonymaste@...>
>
> hmm,
>
> Lets look into the life och chris(my real name) and see what his alst 24h
> was like.
>
> Yesterday same time as now roughly 16:30
>
> leave work 30 min early, go home, check icq, send msg to friends
> "loging on Vashi on solusek ro"
>
> play for 3h
> get killed by a griff for the first time, karanas was no fun today.
> and humans look funny in banded armor
> call for pizza, sit in safe spot, run down to pizza place(2min).
> Eat pizza while wackin scarabs in N Ro.
>
> Gf calls, talk 5 min, distracted by party members wanting to go,
> partymember laughs at a humans butt in chainmail
> gf hangs up askin me to call when the computer is turned off.
>
> Spends 10 min healing after dorn got pulled by someone.
> Tries to light a smoke buy realize that I should have bought more.
>
> check the time, damn 1:00 time to go to bed.
>
> Wake up 30 min late, dreamin of clashing weapons and ugly humans in
> chainmail.
> run down to work, buy a sandwich on the way.
>
> spend 90% of work time reading this newsgroup and every post on eqvault and
> stratics, checks maps for now hunting areas.
>
> write 50 lines of code that wont work
>
> AAAHHHRRRRGGGGG I thought i was safe from the computer gaming addiction when
> I gave up muds 6 months ago and now Im back in it again. Just as bad as it
> was then, if not worse.
>
> Id better log on to EQ again, atleast I can be productive there.
>
> Vashi, man Im pathetic
>
> oh and sorry for my spelling. I know it sucks
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> It's finally here! What's your opinion?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Create a Star Wars discussion group at ONElist.

> For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
